title: Keep giving me chat restrictions, I'm not going to stop abusing people.
body: The instant I get a message to send it's going to be used to abuse someone, so what if I cannot call the other team garbage while I decimate them. Making my teammates threaten to AFK satisfies me enough.

replies.body:
Go listen to more Justin Bieber.
http://prntscr.com/853okd

Abuse Riot for making a game that expresses how bad people are at life.

"Teamwork".
"Respect"

wtf is dis sh*t.

People used to be hung for this sh*t coz they called it "witchcraft".

Just coz satan is my teammate, does not mean I deserve to be Splagh. gargle gargle gargle.
